name: LaylaSmartBed
0:
”Alexa, ask layla bed to find device.”
”Alexa, ask layla bed to zero g”
”Alexa, ask layla bed to lower foot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: layla bed
des: Control your Layla bed with your voice! Use voice commands to use the available motion, lighting, massage and other features of your Layla bed. You can raise and lower your head, elevate and lower your feet, put the bed in Zero-G for ultimate comfort, start, stop, and increase or decrease massage intensity, turn under-bed lighting on and off, and more. Layla voice-enabled adjustable base required. Availability of different features depends on features installed on the base.
